00026 #include "lpc17xx_adc.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00029 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"
00030 #include "lpc17xx_gpio.h"

00032 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00038 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS ***********************/
00039 #define MCB_LPC_1768
00040 //#define IAR_LPC_1768
00041 #define MCB_LPC17XX_ADC_INJECT_TEST
00042 
00043 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00044 #define MCB_LPC_1768_ADC_BURST_MULTI
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00048 #define _ADC_INT                        ADC_ADINTEN2
00049 #define _ADC_CHANNEL            ADC_CHANNEL_2
00050 
00051 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768_ADC_BURST_MULTI
00052 #define _ADC_INT_3                      ADC_ADINTEN3
00053 #define _ADC_CHANNEL_3          ADC_CHANNEL_3
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 #elif defined(IAR_LPC_1768)
00057 #define _ADC_INT                        ADC_ADINTEN5
00058 #define _ADC_CHANNEL            ADC_CHANNEL_5
00059 #endif
00060 
00062 #define DMA_SIZE                8
00063 
00064 #ifdef MCB_LPC17XX_ADC_INJECT_TEST
00065 #define GPIO_INT        (1<<10)
00066 #define POLL_LED        (1<<4)          // P1.28
00067 #endif
00068 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00069 uint8_t menu1[] =
00070 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00071 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00072 " ADC burst demo \n\r"
00073 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00074 "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00075 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00076 " Use ADC with 12-bit resolution rate of 200KHz, running burst mode (single or multiple input)\n\r"
00077 " Display ADC value via UART0\n\r"
00078 " Turn the potentiometer to see how ADC value changes\n\r"
00079 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00080 
00081 #ifdef MCB_LPC17XX_ADC_INJECT_TEST
00082 static BOOL_8 toggle=FALSE;
00083 #endif
00084 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTION *************************/
00085 void print_menu(void);
00086 
00087 #ifdef MCB_LPC17XX_ADC_INJECT_TEST
00088 void EINT3_IRQHandler(void);
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00092 #ifdef MCB_LPC17XX_ADC_INJECT_TEST
00093 void EINT3_IRQHandler(void)
00094 {
00095           if (GPIO_GetIntStatus(1, 10, 1))
00096           {
00097                   GPIO_ClearInt(2,(1<<10));
00098                   toggle=~toggle;
00099 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768_ADC_BURST_MULTI
00100                   if(toggle)
00101                   {
00102                           ADC_ChannelCmd(LPC_ADC,_ADC_CHANNEL_3,ENABLE);
00103                           FIO_ByteSetValue(1, 3, POLL_LED);
00104                   }
00105                   else
00106                   {
00107                           ADC_ChannelCmd(LPC_ADC,_ADC_CHANNEL_3,DISABLE);
00108                           FIO_ByteClearValue(1, 3, POLL_LED);
00109                   }
00110 #endif
00111           }
00112 }
00113 #endif
00114 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00115 /*********************************************************************/
00120 void print_menu(void)
00121 {
00122         _DBG(menu1);
00123 }
00124 
00125 
00126 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00127 /*********************************************************************/
00132 int c_entry(void)
00133 {
00134         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00135 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768_ADC_BURST_MULTI
00136         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg1;
00137 #endif
00138         uint32_t tmp;
00139         uint32_t adc_value;
00140         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00141          * – 115200bps
00142          * – 8 data bit
00143          * – No parity
00144          * – 1 stop bit
00145          * – No flow control
00146          */
00147         debug_frmwrk_init();
00148 
00149         // print welcome screen
00150         print_menu();
00151 
00152         /* Because the potentiometer on different boards (MCB & IAR) connect
00153          * with different ADC channel, so we have to configure correct ADC channel
00154          * on each board respectively.
00155          * If you want to check other ADC channels, you have to wire this ADC pin directly
00156          * to potentiometer pin (please see schematic doc for more reference)
00157          */
00158 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00159         /*
00160          * Init ADC pin connect
00161          * AD0.2 on P0.25
00162          */
00163         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00164         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00165         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00166         PinCfg.Pinnum = 25;
00167         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00168         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00169 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768_ADC_BURST_MULTI
00170         /*
00171          * Init ADC pin connect
00172          * AD0.3 on P0.26
00173          */
00174         PinCfg1.Funcnum = 1;
00175         PinCfg1.OpenDrain = 0;
00176         PinCfg1.Pinmode = 0;
00177         PinCfg1.Pinnum = 26;
00178         PinCfg1.Portnum = 0;
00179         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg1);
00180 #endif
00181 #elif defined (IAR_LPC_1768)
00182         /* select P1.31 as AD0.5 */
00183         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00184         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00185         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00186         PinCfg.Pinnum = 31;
00187         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00188         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00189 #endif
00190 
00191 
00192         /* Configuration for ADC:
00193          *  select: ADC channel 2 (if using MCB1700 board)
00194          *              ADC channel 5 (if using IAR-LPC1768 board)
00195          *  ADC conversion rate = 200KHz
00196          */
00197         ADC_Init(LPC_ADC, 200000);
00198         ADC_ChannelCmd(LPC_ADC,_ADC_CHANNEL,ENABLE);
00199 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768_ADC_BURST_MULTI
00200         ADC_ChannelCmd(LPC_ADC,_ADC_CHANNEL_3,ENABLE);
00201 #endif
00202 
00203 #ifdef MCB_LPC17XX_ADC_INJECT_TEST
00204         FIO_ByteSetDir(1, 3, POLL_LED, 1);
00205         FIO_ByteClearValue(1, 3, POLL_LED);
00206         // Enable GPIO interrupt P2.10
00207         GPIO_IntCmd(2,(1<<10),1);
00208         NVIC_EnableIRQ(EINT3_IRQn);
00209 #endif
00210 
00211         //Start burst conversion
00212         ADC_BurstCmd(LPC_ADC,ENABLE);
00213         while(1)
00214         {
00215 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768
00216                 adc_value =  ADC_ChannelGetData(LPC_ADC,ADC_CHANNEL_2);
00217                 _DBG("ADC value on channel 2: ");
00218 #elif defined (IAR_LPC_1768)
00219                 adc_value =  ADC_ChannelGetData(LPC_ADC,ADC_CHANNEL_5);
00220                 _DBG("ADC value on channel 5: ");
00221 #endif
00222                 _DBD32(adc_value);
00223                 _DBG_("");
00224 #ifdef MCB_LPC_1768_ADC_BURST_MULTI
00225                 adc_value =  ADC_ChannelGetData(LPC_ADC,ADC_CHANNEL_3);
00226                 _DBG("ADC value on channel 3: ");
00227                 _DBD32(adc_value);
00228                 _DBG_("");
00229 #endif
00230                 // Wait for a while
00231                 for(tmp = 0; tmp < 1500000; tmp++);
00232         }
00233         ADC_DeInit(LPC_ADC);
00234         return (0);
00235 }
00236 
00237 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00238 int main (void)
00239 {
00240         return c_entry();
00241 }
00242 #ifdef  DEBUG

00244 * @brief                Reports the name of the source file and the source line number
00245 *                               where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00246 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00247 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00248 * @return               None
00249 *******************************************************************************/
00250 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00251 {
00252         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00253          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00254 
00255         /* Infinite loop */
00256         while(1);
00257 }
00258 #endif
00259 
00260 /*
00261  * @}
